text: John Letford MBE (born 29 August 1935) is a Scottish politician. He was the Lord Provost of Dundee from 2003 to 2012. The new Lord Provost is Bob Duncan. On 24 March 2009, Letford resigned from the Labour Group on Dundee City Council. He became an independent councillor. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:Politicians from Aberdeen Category:Members of the Order of the British Empire Category:Living people
title: John Letford
